caption.p: Phylogenetic tree of a molecular evolution database constructed by envelope (E) gene in other countries to identify imported sources in Guangdong since 2005. ( A– D) The same color in genotype I represents the viral sequences that clustered into the same lineage. Yellow and blue represent genotypes IV and V, respectively. ( A) A similar lineage characterization was revealed when 27 representative sequences (black circles) from each lineage of Guangdong clustered together with 143 sequences from other countries. ( B– D) Phylogenetic tree by E gene sequences of genotypes I, IV, and V, respectively. This figure appears in color at www.ajtmh.org.
